name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms. Often conveys general pleasure and good cheer or humor.

name: Grinning Face with Big Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms. Often conveys general happiness and good-natured amusement.

name: Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms. Often conveys general happiness and good-natured amusement.

name: Beaming Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and full-toothed grin, as if saying Cheese! for the camera. Teeth may be smoothed-over or crosshatched. Often expresses a radiant, gratified happiness. Tone varies, including warm, silly, amused, or proud.

name: Grinning Squinting Face
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile and scrunched, X-shaped eyes. Often conveys excitement or hearty laughter.

name: Grinning Face with Sweat
description: Has the same grin and eyes as 😄 Grinning Face With Smiling Eyes but with a single, blue bead of sweat, usually over its left eye. Intended to depict nerves or discomfort but commonly used to express a close call, as if saying Whew! and wiping sweat from the forehead.

name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side as if rolling on the floor laughing (the internet acronym ROFL). Sheds two tears and tilts right on most platforms. Often conveys hysterical laughter more intense than 😂 Face With Tears of Joy.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard. Widely used to show something is funny or pleasing.

name: Slightly Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a thin, closed smile. Conveys a wide range of positive, happy, and friendly sentiments. Its tone can also be patronizing, passive-aggressive, or ironic, as if saying This is fine when it’s really not.

name: Upside-Down Face
description: A classic smiley, turned upside down. Implemented as a flipped version of 🙂 Slightly Smiling Face on most platforms.

name: Melting Face
description: A yellow smiley face melting into a puddle.

name: Winking Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile or open mouth shown winking, usually its left eye. May signal a joke, flirtation, hidden meaning, or general positivity. Tone varies, including playful, affectionate, suggestive, or ironic.

name: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks. Often expresses genuine happiness and warm, positive feelings.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and halo, usually blue, overhead. Often represents angels, prayers, and blessings. May also convey angelic behavior, e.g., doing good deeds. See also 👼 Baby Angel.

name: Smiling Face with Hearts
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, rosy cheeks, and several hearts floating around its head. Expresses a range of happy, affectionate feelings, especially being in love. The placement of the hearts varies slightly by platform.

name: Smiling Face with Heart-Eyes
description: A yellow face with an open smile, sometimes showing teeth, and red, cartoon-styled hearts for eyes. Often conveys enthusiastic feelings of love, infatuation, and adoration, e.g., I love/am in love with this person or thing.

name: Star-Struck
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with stars for eyes, as if seeing a beloved celebrity. Color of stars widely varies by platform, though commonly gold or red. May express that someone or something is amazing, fascinating, impressive, or exciting.

name: Face Blowing a Kiss
description: A yellow face winking with puckered lips blowing a kiss, depicted as a small, red heart. May represent a kiss goodbye or good night and convey feelings of love and affection more generally.

name: Kissing Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of love and affection.

name: Smiling Face
description: A classic smiley. A yellow face with a modest smile, rosy cheeks, and soft, closed eyes. Many platforms, including Apple, feature relaxed eyebrows. Conveys a wide range of warm, positive feelings, including love, happiness, and gratitude.

name: Kissing Face with Closed Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, rosy cheeks, and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of romantic love and affection. Several platforms, including Apple, feature the same eyes and cheeks as their ☺️ Smiling Face.

name: Kissing Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of love and affection.

name: Smiling Face with Tear
description: A yellow face with open eyes, a thin closed-mouth smile, and a single tear falling from one of its eyes. Can be used to express a wide range of emotions and expressions including gratitude, tender happiness, an attempt to look happy when actually sad, or smiling through pain. Can also be a response to something that is bittersweet.

name: Face Savoring Food
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile with its tongue sticking out of one corner, as if licking its lips in appetite or contentment. Widely used to convey that a food item is delicious. May also express that a person is attractive.

name: Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a big grin, playfully sticking out its tongue. Can variously convey a sense of fun, excitement, silliness, cuteness, happiness, or jesting, as if saying Just kidding!

name: Winking Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face sticking out its tongue and making a zany wink, usually shown with its right eye closed and left wide open. Often conveys a sense of fun, excitement, wackiness, buffoonery, or joking.

name: Zany Face
description: A yellow face with its head tilted, its tongue hanging out of a big grin, and wide eyes in a wild, cockeyed expression. Generally used to express silliness.

name: Squinting Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes and a big grin, sticking out its tongue. Often conveys a sense of fun, excitement, playfulness, hilarity, and happiness, as if saying Squee! or Awesome!

name: Money-Mouth Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, dollar signs for eyes, and an open smile sticking out a tongue styled after a green, dollar banknote. Some platforms depict the dollar-sign eyes in green circles.

name: Smiling Face with Open Hands
description: A yellow face smiling with open hands, as if giving a hug. May be used to offer thanks and support, show love and care, or express warm, positive feelings more generally.

name: Face with Hand Over Mouth
description: A yellow face with a hand covering its mouth. Displays most often with smiling eyes and/or blushing cheeks, suggesting coy laughter or embarrassment, as if cheekily saying Oops!

name: Face with Open Eyes and Hand Over Mouth
description: A yellow face with open (non-smiling) eyes and a hand over the mouth, used to convey shock or surprise.

name: Face with Peeking Eye
description: A yellow face with its hands over its eyes and raised eyebrows. One wide eye is peeking through the fingers.

name: Shushing Face
description: A yellow face placing an index finger over pursed lips, as if issuing Shh! or Shush! for silence. Some platforms feature raised eyebrows. Apple’s design suggests the face is tilting back slightly.

name: Thinking Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on its chin. Intended to show a person pondering or deep in thought. Often used to question or scorn something or someone, as if saying Hmm, I don't know about that. Tone varies, including earnest, playful, puzzled, skeptical, and mocking.

name: Saluting Face
description: A yellow face with its right hand saluting. Used as a sign of respect.

name: Zipper-Mouth Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a closed zipper for a mouth. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys a secret or that someone will keep one (e.g., My lips are sealed). May also be used to tell someone to stop talking (e.g., Zip it! or I’ll shut up now).

name: Face with Raised Eyebrow
description: A yellow face with a flat, neutral mouth and furrowed eyebrows, its left raised higher than its right. Conveys a wide variety of sentiments, including suspicion, skepticism, concern, consideration, disbelief, and disapproval.

name: Neutral Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a flat, closed mouth. Intended to depict a neutral sentiment but often used to convey mild irritation and concern or a deadpan sense of humor.

name: Expressionless Face
description: A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth. May convey a sense of frustration or annoyance more intense than suggested by 😐 Neutral Face, as if taking a moment to collect itself.

name: Face Without Mouth
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys speechlessness, humility, and silence. May also convey moderately negative emotions, such as disappointment, frustration, or sadness.

name: Dotted Line Face
description: A muted yellow neutral face with a dotted or dashed outline.

name: Face in Clouds
description: A face that appears surrounded by clouds or a haze of smoke. Ambiguous in appearance, this may represent a foggy state of mind, confusion, or even a sense of calm bliss.

name: Smirking Face
description: A yellow face with a sly, smug, mischievous, or suggestive facial expression. It features a half-smile, raised eyebrows, and eyes looking to the side. Often used to convey flirtation or sexual innuendo.

name: Unamused Face
description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, a frown, and eyes looking to the side. May convey a variety of negative emotions, including irritation, displeasure, grumpiness, and skepticism, as if giving the side-eye.

name: Face with Rolling Eyes
description: A yellow face with a small, closed mouth, flat or frowning, rolling its large, white eyes upwards. As with the gesture of an eye-roll, commonly conveys moderate disdain, disapproval, frustration, or boredom. Tone varies, including playful, sassy, resentful, and sarcastic, as if saying Yeah, whatever.

name: Grimacing Face
description: A yellow face with simple open eyes showing clenched teeth. May represent a range of negative or tense emotions, especially nervousness, embarrassment, or awkwardness (e.g., Eek!).

name: Shaking Face
description: A face that appears to be shaking from side to side with its eyes and mouth open wide.

name: Face Exhaling
description: A face showing a visible breath of air being dispelled. Used to represent relief, exhaustion, or as a sigh of disappointment or displeasure.

name: Lying Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, enlarged eyes, slight frown, and long nose, indicating it’s telling a lie in the manner of Pinocchio. Like that character, Facebook's design features a wooden nose.

name: Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with soft, closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slight smile. Facebook’s design features a slightly open mouth, as if sighing.

name: Pensive Face
description: A pensive, remorseful face. Saddened by life. Quietly considering where things all went wrong. Depicted as a yellow face with sad, closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a slight, flat mouth.

name: Sleepy Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, mouth slightly open, and a blue snot bubble coming from its nose. Snot bubbles indicate a character is tired or sleeping in anime or manga. Not to be confused with 😴 Sleeping Face

name: Drooling Face
description: A yellow face, usually shown with closed eyes and raised eyebrows, with saliva drooling from one corner of its mouth. Often used to show desire for a person (sexy, attractive) or object (e.g., delicious food). May also represent someone is tired or sleeping.

name: Sleeping Face
description: A yellow face with eyes closed and mouth letting out three, cartoon-styled Zzz’s overhead to indicate it's sound asleep. The Zzz’s appear blue or purple across most platforms. May also represent boredom (slang, snooze).

name: Face with Medical Mask
description: A yellow face wearing a white surgical mask, as used by health workers in hospitals as well as the general public during a pandemic. May be worn to avoid sickness or spreading airborne diseases.

name: Face with Thermometer
description: A yellow face with raised or furrowed eyebrows and a thermometer in its mouth. Often depicted with red cheeks, as if feverish. May be used to represent a hospital patient or person with a cold or flu.

name: Face with Head-Bandage
description: A yellow face with a half-frown and white bandage wrapped around its head, often depicted partially over one eye. May represent physical injury or pain but also emotional hurting, sometimes for ironic effect.

name: Nauseated Face
description: A sickly-green face with concerned eyes and puffed, often red cheeks, as if holding back vomit. May represent physical illness or general disgust. Not to be confused with 🤮 Face Vomiting.

name: Face Vomiting
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes spewing bright-green vomit. May represent physical illness or disgust, more intensely so than 🤢 Nauseated Face.

name: Sneezing Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes sneezing or blowing its nose into a white tissue, as if from a cold or allergies. Often depicted with a crumpled-looking mouth.

name: Hot Face
description: A reddish-orange face with furrowed eyebrows, tongue stuck out, and beads of sweat, as if overheated from high temperatures. Number and position of sweat droplets vary by platforms. May also represent physical attractiveness (slang, hot).

name: Cold Face
description: An icy-blue face with gritted teeth usually depicted with icicles clinging to its cheeks or jaw, as if frozen from extreme cold. May also represent unfriendliness (slang, cold) or excellence (slang, cool or chill).

name: Woozy Face
description: A yellow face with a crumpled mouth and a cockeyed expression, as if tired and emotional from inebriation or smitten with love. Depicted with raised or furrowed eyebrows and at least one eye half-open. WhatsApp's design features a tongue hanging out.

name: Face with Crossed-Out Eyes
description: A yellow face with X’s for eyes and a round, open mouth. Often depicted with raised or furrowed eyebrows. Facebook’s design features a purple forehead. Previously displayed with spiral eyes on some platforms.

name: Face with Spiral Eyes
description: A face showing a spiral eyes, commonly used to indicate dizziness, but may also represent hypnosis or other forms of disorientation.

name: Exploding Head
description: A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding in the shape of a brain-like mushroom cloud. A visual form of the expression mind blown, it may represent such emotions as shock, awe, amazement, and disbelief.

name: Cowboy Hat Face
description: Yee-haw! A yellow smiley wearing a wide-brimmed, brown-leather cowboy hat. Its smile varies across platforms. May convey a sense of exuberance, whimsy, confidence, adventure, or other sentiments.

name: Partying Face
description: A yellow face with a party hat blowing a party horn as confetti floats around its head. Used for celebrating joyous occasions (such as New Year's Eve or World Emoji Day) and enjoying good times more generally.

name: Disguised Face
description: A yellow face with big glasses, a large nose, thick eyebrows, and a mustache. Used to represent someone in disguise.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: A yellow face with a broad, closed smile wearing black sunglasses, as if a pair of classic Wayfarers. Often used to convey the slang sense of cool. May also express a confident, carefree attitude or that something is excellent.

name: Nerd Face
description: A smiling yellow face with glasses, often with teeth showing, originally buck teeth on most platforms.

name: Face with Monocle
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows wearing a monocle. Usually depicted with a small, intent frown and head slightly upturned, as if in careful inspection.

name: Confused Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes and a skewed frown, as if scrunching its cheeks or chewing its lips. A look of feeling unsure.

name: Face with Diagonal Mouth
description: A yellow face with a closed slanted mouth. Can be used to express skepticism, confusion, or frustration.

name: Worried Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised or furrowed eyebrows, and a broad frown. May convey a variety of moderately sad or tense emotions, including concern, anxiety, alarm, disappointment, and unhappiness.

name: Slightly Frowning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a slight frown. Often conveys a mild degree of concern, disappointment, or sadness, but usually less intensely than ☹️ Frowning Face.

name: Frowning Face
description: A classic sad face. A yellow face with simple, open eyes and wide, steep frown. May convey such feelings as moderate concern or disappointment and affectionate sadness, as when missing a loved one. Its sentiment is usually more intense than 🙁 Slightly Frowning Face, which has a smaller frown.

name: Face with Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a large, round mouth, slack with surprise or shock, as if saying Wow! or Oh my! May convey such feelings as awe or disbelief, often milder or more ironic in tone than 😱 Face Screaming in Fear.

name: Hushed Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a small, open mouth, as if it has been hushed by concern or correction. Meaning widely varies, but its expression is commonly taken as surprise, embarrassment, or mild excitement.

name: Astonished Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and an open mouth, as if gasping in shock or surprise. Often depicted showing its upper teeth. May convey a wide range of emotions, including awe, amazement, admiration, disbelief, excitement, or concern.

name: Flushed Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, a small, closed mouth, wide, white eyes staring straight ahead, and blushing cheeks. Intended to depict such feelings as embarrassment, but meaning very widely varies. Other senses include flattery, surprise, disbelief, admiration, affection, and excitement.

name: Pleading Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows, a small frown, and large, “puppy dog” eyes, as if begging or pleading. May also represent adoration or feeling touched by a loving gesture.

name: Face Holding Back Tears
description: A yellow face with tears welling up at the bottom of its two large eyes.

name: Frowning Face with Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and an open frown. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey mild sadness, disappointment, concern, and amazement.

name: Anguished Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, open frown, and raised eyebrows. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey alarm, confusion, or sadness, as if gasping in shock or concern.

name: Fearful Face
description: A face with small, open eyes, open frown, raised eyebrows, and a pale blue forehead, as if experiencing a cold flash. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue.

name: Anxious Face with Sweat
description: A face with open eyes and a small, open frown. Its eyebrows are furrowed, with a single bead of cold sweat dripping down, and its forehead is pale blue, as if experiencing a cold flash. Samsung's design shows upper teeth and tongue.

name: Sad but Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety. Also known as Disappointed but Relieved Face, suggesting the smiley is upset but is grateful things didn’t turn out worse.

name: Crying Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows and a slight frown, shedding a single, blue tear from one eye down its cheek. May convey a moderate degree of sadness or pain, usually less intensely than 😭 Loudly Crying Face.

name: Loudly Crying Face
description: A yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter, pride or overwhelming joy.

name: Face Screaming in Fear
description: A yellow face screaming in fear, depicted by wide, white eyes, a long, open mouth, hands pressed on cheeks, and a pale blue forehead, as if it has lost its color. Its expression evokes Edvard Munch’s iconic painting The Scream.

name: Confounded Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes and a crumpled mouth, as if quivering in frustration or holding back tears. May be used to represent being overcome with various emotions, including irritation, frustration, disgust, and sadness, as if to the point of defeat.

name: Persevering Face
description: A yellow face with a slight frown, furrowed eyebrows, and scrunched eyes, as if holding back tears or exerting great effort. May convey various degrees and tones of frustration, sadness, helplessness, and struggle. Facebook’s design features a light-purple forehead.

name: Disappointed Face
description: A yellow face with a frown and closed, downcast eyes, as if aching with sorrow or pain. May convey a variety of unhappy emotions, including disappointment, grief, stress, regret, and remorse.

name: Downcast Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, frown, and a bead of sweat dripping from its forehead. Usually depicted with a single sweat bead on its right side, though Facebook and WhatsApp include the sweat bead on its left side.

name: Weary Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed brows, and a broad, open frown, as if distraught to the point of giving up. Usually shown with upper teeth and sometimes tongue.

name: Tired Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a broad, open frown, as if yawning in exhaustion or groaning in exasperation. Usually shown with upper teeth and sometimes tongue.

name: Yawning Face
description: A yellow face with eyes closed and mouth wide open covered by a hand. Captured mid-yawn, this may represent having insufficient sleep, or to imply boredom with a person or topic.

name: Face with Steam From Nose
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, broad frown, and two puffs of steam blowing out of its nose, as if in a huff or fuming.

name: Enraged Face
description: A red face with an angry expression: frowning mouth with eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward. Bears the same expression as 😠 Angry Face on most platforms and may convey more intense degrees of anger, e.g., hate or rage.

name: Angry Face
description: A yellow face with a frowning mouth and eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward in anger.

name: Face with Symbols on Mouth
description: An angry-red face with a black bar and white grawlixes covering its mouth, indicating it's swearing or being vulgar. Grawlixes are typographical symbols (e.g., @#$%&!) representing swear words or obscenities. Often used to convey an outburst of anger, frustration, or rage.

name: Smiling Face with Horns
description: A face, usually purple, with devil horns, a wide grin, and eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward in the same manner as 😠 Angry Face on most platforms. Google’s design is red and Facebook’s has black horns and green eyes.

name: Angry Face with Horns
description: A face, usually purple, with two devil horns, frowning mouth and eyes, and eyebrows scrunched downwards in anger. Bears the same expression as 😠 Angry Face and 😡 Pouting Face on most platforms. Google’s design is red and Facebook’s has black horns, green eyes, and clenched teeth.

name: Skull
description: A whitish-gray, cartoon-styled human skull with large, black eye sockets. Commonly expresses figurative death, e.g., dying from extreme laughter, frustration, or affection.

name: Skull and Crossbones
description: A cartoon human skull atop an X-shaped pair of bones, as on a pirate flag or poison symbol. Samsung’s design previously displayed a skull and crossbones on a yellow triangle, indicating a hazardous material.

name: Pile of Poo
description: A swirl of brown poop, shaped like soft-serve ice cream with large, excited eyes and a big, friendly smile.

name: Clown Face
description: A circus or birthday clown displayed with white face makeup, a red nose, exaggerated eyes and smile, and two tufts of hair (red or blue). Commonly used as comment on TikTok or other social media platforms to indicate that a person is foolish, idiotic and/or selfish.

name: Ogre
description: A grotesque, red face with horns, wide eyes, a large nose, crooked fangs, and a fringe of shaggy hair. Depicts an oni, a kind of hideous ogre in Japanese folklore.

name: Goblin
description: A menacing, red mask featuring a grotesquely long nose, angry eyes, and bushy eyebrows and mustache. Depicts a tengu, a proud trickster figure in Japanese folklore.

name: Ghost
description: Boo! A white, cartoon ghost making a silly face. Its tongue is stuck out and arms are outstretched, as if trying to scare someone in a friendly way. Several platforms feature one larger, bulging eye, while others show the ghost winking.

name: Alien
description: A classic alien face. The oval, bare head of a gray or green alien with large black eyes and a slight, friendly smile. Samsung depicts nostrils, Facebook a nose.

name: Alien Monster
description: A friendly-looking, tentacled space creature with two eyes. Most major platforms style their design after aliens in classic arcade games like Space Invaders, rendering it purple and pixellated, as if in 8-bit graphics.

name: Robot
description: The head of a classic robot. Commonly depicted as a vintage, tin toy robot with circular eyes, a triangular nose, knobs for ears, a light and/or antennae atop its head, and a grill-like mouth similar to a grimace. Colors vary across platform, but its head is metallic on most platforms.

name: Grinning Cat
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😀 Grinning Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Grinning Cat with Smiling Eyes
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😄 Grinning Face With Smiling Eyes. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Cat with Tears of Joy
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😂 Face With Tears of Joy. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Smiling Cat with Heart-Eyes
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😍 Smiling Face With Heart-Eyes. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Cat with Wry Smile
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😏 Smirking Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Kissing Cat
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😚 Kissing Face With Closed Eyes. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Weary Cat
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😩 Weary Face. Its expression more closely resembles 😱 Face Screaming in Fear. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Crying Cat
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😢 Crying Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Pouting Cat
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😡 Pouting Face. Also resembles 😠 Angry Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms. Sometimes used to represent the internet meme and celebrity Grumpy Cat.

name: See-No-Evil Monkey
description: The see no evil monkey, called Mizaru (Japanese for “see not”), one of the Three Wise Monkeys. Depicted as the brown 🐵 Monkey Face with hands covering its eyes.

name: Hear-No-Evil Monkey
description: The hear no evil monkey, called Kikazaru (Japanese for “hear not”), one of the Three Wise Monkeys. Depicted as the brown 🐵 Monkey Face with hands covering its ears.

name: Speak-No-Evil Monkey
description: The speak no evil monkey, called Iwazaru (Japanese for “say not”), one of the Three Wise Monkeys. Depicted as the brown 🐵 Monkey Face with hands covering its mouth.

name: Kiss Mark
description: The mark left after a firm kiss is placed with bright lipstick. Used in place of ‘xxx’ (kisses), or to send a kiss to someone. More seductive than the kiss emoji.

name: Love Letter
description: The back of an envelope, generally shown in white and sealed with a red heart. Represents a love letter or note, valentine, or affectionate greeting card. Commonly used to convey various feelings or messages of love and happiness.

name: Heart with Arrow
description: A heart emoji with an arrow through the center, like the arrow that cupid shoots for love.

name: Heart with Ribbon
description: A heart-shaped box, tied with a ribbon. May be a gift box, box of chocolates, or a jewellery box.

name: Sparkling Heart
description: A pink love heart with stars around it, making it look like it is sparkling or shimmering.

name: Growing Heart
description: A pink heart, inside a slightly larger pink heart, inside a larger-again pink heart. Intended to give the impression of a heart increasing in size.

name: Beating Heart
description: A heart with vibration/movement lines above it or around it, indicating it is beating. Displayed in pink or red on most platforms.

name: Revolving Hearts
description: Hearts revolving around one or more other hearts. This emoji was originally animated on a number of Japanese devices.

name: Two Hearts
description: Two pink love hearts. One larger than the other. Can be used to display that “love is in the air”.

name: Heart Decoration
description: A decorative heart that generally displays as a white heart-shaped cutout in a pink or purple roundrect.

name: Heart Exclamation
description: A decorative exclamation mark, where a heart forms the top part of the symbol, and a circle the lower part. Similar to the way to the man in business suit levitating also creates a similar shape.

name: Broken Heart
description: A love heart, broken in two. This emoji represents the aching one feels when they are missing the person they love.

name: Heart on Fire
description: A heart shown on fire, for extreme or passionate forms of love or lust. Most representative of desire or lust, this emoji may also indicate a sense of burning a past love and moving on.

name: Mending Heart
description: A heart shown with a bandage across one side; the opposite of a broken heart. May be used to indicate the process of healing, recovery, or to express sympathy for someone going through a difficult time.

name: Red Heart
description: A classic red love heart emoji, used for expressions of love and romance. This is the most popular heart emoji A similar emoji exists for the heart suit in a deck of playing cards.

name: Pink Heart
description: A plain pink heart, expected to be frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, and feelings of warmth, and the color pink.

name: Orange Heart
description: Orange Heart was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

name: Yellow Heart
description: A yellow or gold colored heart, frequently used alongside other colored hearts. This displayed as a pink hairy heart on Android 4.4.

name: Green Heart
description: A green heart emoji, often used alongside other colored hearts. Frequently used on Twitter in reference to Korean boy band NCT.

name: Blue Heart
description: A blue heart emoji, commonly used by brands as a neutral heart color.

name: Light Blue Heart
description: A light blue heart, frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, feelings of warmth, and the color blue.

name: Purple Heart
description: A purple heart emoji, often used alongside other colored hearts. Frequently used on Twitter in reference to Korean boy band Bangtan Sonyeondan, more commonly known as BTS.

name: Brown Heart
description: A brown heart, often used discuss topics related to racial identity 🧑🏽🧑🏾🧑🏿

name: Black Heart
description: A heart shaded completely black. May be used to express morbidity, sorrow, or a form of dark humor, but despite the color remains most commonly used for love and affection.

name: Grey Heart
description: A grey heart, frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, feelings of warmth, and the color grey.

name: White Heart
description: A white heart emoji, used for love and affection. Also commonly used to discuss someone passing away.

name: Hundred Points
description: 100 emoji: the number one-hundred, written in red, underlined twice for emphasis.

name: Anger Symbol
description: A red symbol found in Anime/Manga and used to represent the veins popping on a very angry person.

name: Collision
description: A cartoon-styled representation of a collision. Depicted as a star-like, orange-and-yellow fiery burst, generally with one point extending to the bottom right, as if from the source of the collision.

name: Dizzy
description: A cartoon-styled representation of dizziness. Generally depicted as one or more yellow stars swirling in a yellow or blue circle.

name: Sweat Droplets
description: Three, light blue droplets, as sweat beads, splashing down to the right. Resembles plewds, stylized sweat droplets used in comics and animation to show characters working hard or feeling stressed.

name: Dashing Away
description: A cartoon-styled gust of air. Depicted as a small, gray cloud with motion lines, rushing to the left.

name: Hole
description: A round, black, cartoon-styled hole, as a manhole or a hole (cup) in golf. May be used to represent various types of literal or figurative holes, e.g., black holes, rabbit holes.

name: Bomb
description: A cartoon-styled bomb, depicted as a black ball with a burning fuse.

name: Speech Balloon
description: A cartoon-style balloon used to represent spoken word in comics. Sometimes  used in communication apps to indicate that another person is typing a message.

name: Eye in Speech Bubble
description: A speech bubble showing an eye inside. When using text-to-speech on Apple platforms, this emoji is read aloud as: "Eye in speech bubble representing anti-bullying campaign". This emoji was released in conjunction with the Ad Council for the I Am A Witness campaign.

name: Left Speech Bubble
description: A left-facing speech bubble, which was included in Unicode 7.0, but not considered a standard addition for the purposes of emoji presentation.

name: Right Anger Bubble
description: A form of speech balloon used with angular edges, used to denote angry speech in comics.

name: Thought Balloon
description: A large cloud-like shape more commonly known as a thought bubble.

name: Zzz
description: A series of three Zs making a Zzz. Represents sleeping, snoring, dreaming, or any sleep-related state. Can also be used in some contexts to represent something that is boring.

name: Waving Hand
description: A hand waving most commonly used to say “hello” or “goodbye”.

name: Folded Hands
description: Two hands placed firmly together, meaning please or thank you in Japanese culture. A common alternative use for this emoji is for prayer, using the same gesture as praying hands. It can also represent a respectful greeting or show of adoration many in Southeast Asian religions and cultures, such as the Hindu namaste or Buddhist añjali mudra.

name: Brain
description: A human brain, shown in pink on most platforms. Used to indicate thinking or the human mind.

name: Anatomical Heart
description: A red anatomical heart, shown with blue or purple veins on some platforms.

name: Lungs
description: Pink anatomical lungs and trachea, shown with bronchial tubes on some platforms. Used in medical contexts to talk about lung health. Sometimes used in reference to taking deep breaths, hyperventilating, or breathing in general. Also used in the context of smoking or vaping.

name: Tooth
description: Tooth was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

name: Bone
description: A bone which may be used for a dog to chew on, or as a part of the human body. The type of bone is not specified.

name: Eyes
description: A pair of eyes, glancing slightly to the left on most platforms. The Google version of this emoji previously showed only a single eye, despite the name of this character being eyes (plural).

name: Eye
description: A single human eye, looking forward. This eye is in a different shape and style to the pair of eyes, which are more rounded, and looking to one side.

name: Tongue
description: A tongue, sticking out. May be used as a childish sign of defiance. Alternatively: licking, in various contexts.

name: Mouth
description: A human mouth which is generally displayed as a pair of lips and a top row of teeth, instead of the inside of the mouth.

name: Biting Lip
description: A mouth with the top teeth biting down on one side of the lower lip.

name: Baby
description: The face of a baby with a small tuft of hair on top of its head. Some platforms show the baby sucking on a pacifier, and some platforms show a single tooth in the baby’s open mouth. Android previously displayed this emoji as a swaddled baby.

The Couple With Heart - Woman: No Skin Tone, Woman: Dark Skin Tone emoji is a ZWJ sequence combining 👩 Woman, ‍ Zero Width Joiner, ❤️ Red Heart and 🏿 Dark Skin Tone.
These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

name: Family
description: A family unit shown with two adults and one child. Previously displayed with the same design as 👨‍👩‍👦 Family: Man, Woman, Boy on most platforms, but now has its own gender inclusive appearance.

name: Family: Man, Woman, Boy
description:
The Family: Man, Woman, Boy emoji is a ZWJ sequence combining 👨 Man, ‍ Zero Width Joiner, 👩 Woman and 👦 Boy.
These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

name: Family: Man, Woman, Girl
description: A family with a father, mother, and one daughter.

description: A family with a father, mother, and two sons.

name: Speaking Head
description: The silhouette of a person speaking. Faces left-to-right, with lines demonstrating speech being expelled. Sometimes used in the context of shouting or mansplaining.

name: Bust in Silhouette
description: Generic profile of one person. Often used in interface design to represent a user.

name: Busts in Silhouette
description: Generic profile of two people. Often used in interface design to represent users.

name: People Hugging
description: Two people hugging, shown as faceless blue forms on most platforms. Details of each person are not distinct and thus no options are available to customize the gender or skin tone of either individual.

name: Footprints
description: Two human footsteps,  showing the outline of both feet, including all five toes.

name: Light Skin Tone
description: A pale skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters.

name: Medium-Light Skin Tone
description: A cream white skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters.

name: Medium Skin Tone
description: A moderate brown skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters.

name: Medium-Dark Skin Tone
description: A dark brown skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters.

name: Dark Skin Tone
description: A black skin tone modifier, which can be applied to a range of human emoji characters.

name: Red Hair
description: Red Hair was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Emoji Component Red Hair” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

name: Curly Hair
description: Curly Hair was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Emoji Component Curly Hair” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

name: White Hair
description: White Hair was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Emoji Component White Hair” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

name: Bald
description: Bald was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Emoji Component Bald” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

name: Monkey Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a monkey, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a brown-haired monkey with a tan or pinkish face, round ears, nostrils, and open-mouthed grin.

name: Monkey
description: A monkey, a small primate with long limbs and tail for climbing trees. Generally depicted as a cartoon-styled, brown monkey with a cheeky facial expression, shown in full profile facing left, sitting on its hind legs with a long, curled tail and round ears.

name: Gorilla
description: A gorilla, the powerful, black-haired great ape. Variously depicted in full profile on all fours facing left or as a friendly, cartoon-styled gorilla face looking straight ahead.

name: Orangutan
description: An orangutan, the orange-haired ape with long arms. Depicted facing forward, with a long broad face and sitting with its legs bent. Occasionally shown scratching its head. Color varies across platforms, ranging from orange to light brown.

name: Dog Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a dog, looking straight ahead. Depicted as the face of a dog of various breeds, generally light-brown and white, with pointed or floppy ears and its tongue hanging out.

name: Dog
description: A dog, a faithful, beloved pet canine. Depicted as a light-brown dog, of various breeds, in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long, curled tail held upright and pointed or floppy ears.

name: Guide Dog
description: A guide (or Seeing Eye) dog, trained to help lead a person who is blind or visually impaired. Generally depicted as a yellowish-brown Labrador Retriever on all fours facing left, equipped with a harness and handle. Many platforms additionally include a collar.

name: Service Dog
description: A service animal displayed with a safety vest and lead. Differs from the guide dog as this animal is intended for detection of seizures or other “hidden disabilities”, according to the proposal from Apple.

name: Poodle
description: A poodle, a popular dog breed with curly hair, often groomed in an ornamental pattern.

name: Wolf
description: The face of a wolf, a howling canine that hunts in packs. Generally depicted as a cartoon-styled face of a gray wolf with pointed ears, white cheeks and muzzle, and black nose.

name: Fox
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled faced of a fox, the cunning canine, looking straight ahead. Depicted as an orange fox  face with a black nose, pointed ears, and shaggy, white cheeks.

name: Raccoon
description: A raccoon, a nocturnal mammal with a mask around its eyes. Generally depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled, gray raccoon face looking straight ahead, with black-and-white markings around its eyes and pointed ears and cheeks.

name: Cat Face
description: Meow! A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cat, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a yellowish-orange cat face with pointed ears and whiskers.

name: Cat
description: A domestic cat, beloved as a pet. Generally depicted as a light-orange cat with stripes, as a tabby, in full profile on all fours facing left, with its long tell held upright.

name: Black Cat
description: A black cat shown in full profile, often with its tail curling upward.

name: Lion
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a lion—the large cat and king of the jungle—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a golden-yellow lion face with a light- or dark-brown mane, white muzzle, and neutral expression.

name: Tiger Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a tiger looking straight ahead. Generally depicted in yellowish-orange with black stripes on its forehead and cheeks, a white muzzle, and neutral expression.

name: Tiger
description: A tiger, a large cat with an orange coat and black stripes. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail, its distinctive stripes, and, on some platforms, white patches.

name: Leopard
description: A leopard, a large cat with a yellowish-brown coat and black-and-gold spots. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail and its distinctive pattern.

name: Horse Face
description: The face of a horse, generally facing left. Depicted as a light or reddish-brown horse with a dark brown or black mane, and, on many platforms, a light-colored muzzle.

name: Horse
description: A horse, a hoofed mammal used for riding and racing. Depicted as a brown horse in full profile galloping to the left, with a dark, flowing mane and tail.

name: Unicorn
description: The face of a unicorn, a mythical creature in the form of a white horse with a single, long horn on its forehead. Generally depicted as a white horse head facing left with a pink or purple mane and a yellow or rainbow-colored horn.

name: Zebra
description: A zebra, a horse-like mammal with black-and-white stripes. Variously depicted in full profile on all fours facing left or as a zebra head facing left with a short mane.

name: Donkey
description: A grey donkey or mule, shown in full profile, sometimes with its hind legs kicking into the air.

name: Deer
description: A deer, a fleet-footed, hoofed mammal whose males (bucks, stags) generally have antlers. Variously depicted as a light-brown deer in full profile on all fours facing left or as a deer face looking straight head; both depictions feature large, branched antlers.

name: Moose
description: A moose head with large antlers.

name: Bison
description: A brown bison shown in full profile with horns, a beard, and woolly mane. Also called a buffalo in North America.

name: Cow Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cow looking straight ahead. Variously depicted as a white, brown, or multicolored cow face with a neutral expression, short horns, and a pink or brown muzzle.

name: Ox
description: An ox, a bovine used as a draft animal. Depicted in brown in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and short horns.

name: Water Buffalo
description: A water buffalo, a bovine used to plough rice fields in parts of Asia. Depicted in gray or black in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and broad horns curled up at the tips.

name: Cow
description: A cow, a bovine farmed for its meat or milk. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a black-and-white patched coat (as a Holstein Friesian) and, on many platforms, a pink udder and horns.

name: Pig Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a pig looking straight ahead. Depicted as a pink face with a neutral expression, pointed or floppy ears, and distinctive pig nose.

name: Pig
description: A pig, a plump animal farmed for its meat, such as bacon. Depicted in light pink in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long snout and short, curly tail.

name: Boar
description: A boar, a hairy, wild pig with tusks. Generally depicted as the face of a brown boar, either facing left or looking straight ahead, with prominent tusks projecting from its lower jaw.

name: Pig Nose
description: The snout of a pig. Depicted as a pink oval or slightly pear-shaped nose with two black nostrils.

name: Ram
description: A ram, a male sheep with large, spiraling horns. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a thick, white fleece and light-brown horns.

name: Ewe
description: A ewe, or female sheep raised for its wool, meat, and milk and without the spiraling horns of a ram. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a thick, white fleece and black, gray, or white skin.

name: Goat
description: A goat, a sturdy, hoofed animal raised for its meat and milk. Depicted as a light brown, white, or multicored goat in full profile on all fours facing left, a scraggly beard, upright tail, and brown or yellow horns curving back.

name: Camel
description: A dromedary camel, a long-necked mammal with one large hump on its back. Depicted in light or yellowish brown in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Two-Hump Camel
description: A Bactrian camel, a long-necked mammal with two large humps on its back. Depicted in light or yellowish brown, sometimes with a shaggy mane and humps, in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Llama
description: A llama, a long-necked, camel-like animal, native to South America and used for transport and wool. Depicted as a shaggy white, light-brown, or multicolored llama in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Giraffe
description: A giraffe, the tallest animal on Earth, with spots and a long neck. Generally depicted in yellow or tan in full profile on all fours facing left, with distinctive brown spots and small, horn-like structures.

name: Elephant
description: An elephant, the largest land animal on Earth, with a long trunk and, often, tusks. Generally depicted in gray in full profile on all fours facing left, with tusks and prominent ears, as an African (vs. Asian) elephant.

name: Mammoth
description: A brown wooly mammoth with large curved tusks. Can also be used to represent a mastodon.

name: Rhinoceros
description: A rhinoceros, a large mammal with one or two massive horns on its nose. Generally shown in light gray with two horns, depicted in full profile on all fours or as a rhinoceros head looking left.

name: Hippopotamus
description: A hippopotamus, a squat water mammal with huge jaws. Generally depicted in gray or tan in full profile facing left.

name: Mouse Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a mouse, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a gray or white mouse face with large, round ears, a pink, pointed nose, and whiskers.

name: Mouse
description: Eek! A mouse, a small rodent with large ears and a long tail. Generally depicted in white in full profile on all fours facing left, with pink ears, feet, and tail, often with reddish eyes.

name: Rat
description: A rat, a large rodent with a long tail, known to frequent big cities. Depicted in gray in full profile on all fours facing left, with pink ears, feet, and tail.

name: Hamster
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a hamster—a small rodent often kept as a pet—looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a brown-and-white faced hamster with whiskers, a pink nose, puffy cheeks, and large, round, pink ears, sometimes with a buck tooth.

name: Rabbit Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a rabbit, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a gray and/or white rabbit face with upright ears and pink ears and nose, often with whiskers and a buck tooth.

name: Rabbit
description: A rabbit, a hoppy mammal with long ears. Depicted as a white, gray, or brown rabbit in full profile facing left with pink ears and a short tail, sitting on its long, hind legs or on all fours.

name: Chipmunk
description: A chipmunk, a small rodent with puffy cheeks. Depicted as a brown chipmunk in full profile facing left, sitting on its hind legs with a bushy tail and striped body. Generally holding an acorn or other nut in its hands.

name: Beaver
description: A brown beaver with buckteeth and a wide paddle-like tail. Can be used in the context of actual beavers, or metaphorically to evoke qualities of beavers like working hard, as in the expression beavering away.

name: Hedgehog
description: A hedgehog. A small, spiny mammal sometimes kept as a pet. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a round, brown body covered with spines and a light-brown face and underside.

name: Bat
description: A bat, the flying mammal of the night. Variously depicted as a brown, black, or gray bat, with wings outspread and pointy ears, facing forward or left.

name: Bear
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a brown bear with round ears and a tan muzzle. Resembles a teddy bear.

name: Polar Bear
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of polar bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as the face of a white bear with round ears.

name: Koala
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a koala—a bear-like marsupial known for eating eucalyptus and sleeping—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a gray face with round, fluffy ears and a large, black nose.

name: Panda
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a panda—a bear-like mammal known for eating bamboo—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a white panda face with black ears and black circles around its eyes.

name: Sloth
description: A sloth, the slow-moving, tree-dwelling mammal. Depicted as a light-brown sloth with a wide, whitish, masked face hanging from a tree branch, facing left or right. Generally shown as a three-toed sloth.

name: Otter
description: An otter, the playful water mammal in the weasel family. Depicted as a light-brown otter on its back, with its forepaws held together and whiskered face to the left, generally with its long tail curled up.

name: Skunk
description: A skunk, a bushy-tailed mammal that sprays a foul odor when threatened. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with black hair and its distinctive white stripe running from its head down to a curled-up tail.

name: Kangaroo
description: A kangaroo, a marsupial with a large tail and legs. Depicted in yellowish-brown in full profile facing left with large, pointed ears, shown either resting on its hind legs and tail or jumping.

name: Badger
description: A badger, a stocky mammal in the weasel family with a long, pointed head. Generally depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a gray coat, black-and-white-striped face, and short tail.

name: Paw Prints
description: A pair of paw prints, as left by a pet 🐈 cat or 🐕 dog. Generally depicted as two, staggered, dark-colored paw prints, each showing four toes and a pad.

name: Turkey
description: A turkey, a gobbling bird traditionally eaten at Thanksgiving or Christmas. Depicted in full profile facing left, standing on its legs with a dark-brown body, a white-fringed plume, pink or blue head, and its distinctive red snood and wattle.

name: Chicken
description: A chicken, a bird used for its meat and eggs. Generally depicted as the white head of a chicken (hen or rooster) looking left, with a yellow beak, red comb on its head, and red wattle on its neck.

name: Rooster
description: A rooster (cock), a male chicken known for its cock-a-doodle-do. Depicted as a white or multicolored rooster standing on its legs in full profile facing left, with a red comb on its head and red wattle on its neck.

name: Hatching Chick
description: A baby chicken (chick), hatching from an egg and seeing the world for the first time. Depicted as a yellow chick with an orange beak facing forward in the cracked, bottom half of a white egg, generally shown flapping its wings with a cute facial expression.

name: Baby Chick
description: A yellow baby chicken (chick). Variously depicted as a chick in full profile, standing on its legs, or as a chick head. Both designs show the bird facing left, with an orange beak and feet.

name: Front-Facing Baby Chick
description: A baby chicken (chick), shown as if flapping its wings. Depicted as a yellow chick with an orange beak in full profile standing on its legs, generally with its wings raised.

name: Bird
description: A generic bird. Variously depicted as a blue or red bird, as a bluebird or cardinal, shown standing in full profile, or as a bird head. Both designs show the bird facing left.

name: Black Bird
description:
The Black Bird emoji is a ZWJ sequence combining 🐦 Bird, ‍ Zero Width Joiner and ⬛ Black Large Square.
These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

name: Penguin
description: A penguin, a flightless bird adapted to water and ice. Variously depicted as a full, black-bodied penguin with a white belly and orange bill or as a penguin head.

name: Dove
description: A dove carrying an olive branch, a symbol of peace in Western and Judeo-Christian culture. Depicted as a white bird in full profile facing left, flying as it holds a green sprig in its beak.

name: Eagle
description: A bald eagle, the majestic bird of prey with brown feathers and distinctive white head. Generally depicted facing left, with its wings outspread and talons out, as if swooping down to seize prey.

name: Duck
description: Quack! A duck, a waterbird with webbed feet. Depicted as a male (drake) mallard in full profile facing left, standing on its legs with gray and brown feathers, a yellow bill, and its distinctive green head.

name: Swan
description: A swan, a waterbird with white feathers and a long neck. Depicted in full profile facing left, with a curving neck, orange bill, black eye marking, and wings and legs tucked in, as if gliding in water.

name: Goose
description: A white goose in full profile.

name: Owl
description: An owl, the hooting, large-eyed bird. Depicted as a brown owl with its head facing forward. Shown with large, round, gold-rimmed eyes, talons, tucked wings, and horn-like tufts of feathers.

name: Dodo
description: A brown or gray dodo shown in full profile. Generally depicted with a curved yellow beak, small wings, a fluffy white tail, yellow or orange feet, and black talons.

name: Wing
description: A single white wing with feathers.

name: Feather
description: A single feather slanted to one side. On most platforms it's light brown with a dark brown barred or striped pattern. Can be used to talk about feathers or birds, or to represent something that is lightweight, fluffy, or soft.

name: Flamingo
description: A flamingo, a waterbird with pink feathers and long neck and legs. Depicted as a flamingo in full profile facing left, standing on one leg, usually with a long, black beak.

name: Peacock
description: A peacock, the male bird that displays a large, fan-like, iridescent tale. Depicted facing forward standing on its legs, with a blue body and green tail feathers outspread.

name: Parrot
description: A parrot, a brightly colored bird known for its ability to mimic speech. Depicted in full profile facing left. Resembles a green lovebird with red and yellow wings on some platforms and a scarlet macaw with blue and yellow wings on others.

name: Frog
description: The face of a frog, the hopping amphibian. Generally depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled, light-green frog looking straight ahead, with large eyes, slightly open mouth, and nostrils.

name: Crocodile
description: A crocodile, a stealthy reptile with massive jaws. Generally depicted as a light-green crocodile on all fours, with its long tail curving down to its toothed jaws, facing left.

name: Turtle
description: A turtle, a slow-moving reptile with a shell. Depicted as a light-green turtle in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long neck and green, textured shell.

name: Lizard
description: A lizard, a scaly reptile with a long tail. Depicted as a light-green lizard on all fours from above, generally looking left with large eyes, a lightly textured or colored back, and toes outspread, as a gecko.

name: Snake
description: A snake, a slithering reptile without limbs. Generally depicted as a yellowish-green snake facing left, with a long, coiled body and flicking a red, forked tongue.

name: Dragon Face
description: The face of a dragon, a mythical creature resembling a giant reptile found in the folklore of many cultures. Depicted as a green, Chinese-styled dragon looking straight ahead or facing left. Often shown with huge nostrils, baring large teeth and a red tongue, with antler-like structures on its head, whisker-like tendrils by its nostrils, and a green or yellow mane.

name: Dragon
description: A dragon, a mythical creature resembling a giant reptile found in the folklore of many cultures. Depicted as a green, Chinese-styled dragon in full profile facing left. Generally shown with a curling, snake-like body, clawed feet, yellowish scales on its back, horn-like structures on its head, and whisker-like tendrils by its nostrils.

name: Sauropod
description: A sauropod, a massive, plant-eating dinosaur with a long neck and tail. Depicted as a blue, gray, or green sauropod, as a brachiosaurus, apatosaurus/brontosaurus, or diplodocus. Shown in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: T-Rex
description: A Tyrannosaurus rex, a massive, meat-eating dinosaur with huge jaws, tiny arms, and a long tail. Depicted as a green tyrannosaur standing on its hind lefts facing left, often with a textured back, sharp teeth, and clawed toes.

name: Spouting Whale
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled whale, shown spouting water from its blowhole. Generally depicted as a light-blue whale in full profile facing left, with a round body and white underside, its tail held upright.

name: Whale
description: A whale, the massive marine mammal. Generally depicted as a light-blue whale in full profile facing left, with its tail curving down towards is huge mouth. Shown with a white, textured underside, as a humpback or blue whale.

name: Dolphin
description: A dolphin, a sleek marine mammal known to be social and intelligent. Generally depicted as a light-blue dolphin with a white belly in full profile facing left, its short snout curving down to a prominent dorsal fin and tail, as a bottlenose dolphin leaping in the air.

name: Seal
description: A gray seal with dark eyes and a dark nose. Most platforms feature a design with whiskers.

name: Fish
description: A common fish, as swims in the water. Depicted as a generic, light-blue fish, often with a white underside, in full profile facing left, with fins and prominent gill cover.

name: Tropical Fish
description: A tropical fish, as swims in the warm waters of a coral reef or is kept as a pet in an aquarium. Depicted as a brightly colored fish in full profile facing left, with slender fins. Often shown as a blue-and-yellow fish with stripes, as an angelfish.

name: Blowfish
description: A blowfish (puffer), which puffs up and becomes spiky when alarmed. Depicted as an orange or brown blowfish in full profile facing left, with small fins, a white underside, and a round, spiky body, as if inflated.

name: Shark
description: A shark, a large, stealthy fish with many teeth. Generally depicted as a gray shark in full profile facing left, as a tiger, bull, or great white shark hunting in the water. Shown with a white underside and three gills, its pointed nose and teeth-lined mouth curving down to a sharp dorsal fin and long, pointed tail.

name: Octopus
description: An octopus, a sea animal with eight legs, known to change color and release ink. Generally depicted as a pink or orange octopus facing forward, with a large, round head, prominent eyes, and its tentacle-like arms raised at its sides. Platforms vary in the number of arms shown, ranging from four to the full eight, with several designs featuring suckers on them.

name: Jellyfish
description: A brightly colored jellyfish with a domed bell and dangling tentacles.

name: Spiral Shell
description: A seashell, as found at the beach. Generally depicted as an empty, spiraling, white seashell, as grown by a sea snail or home to a hermit crab. Positioned at various angles across platforms.

name: Coral
description: Coral as found in a reef, of varying shapes and colors. Sometimes used as a symbol of climate change due to coral bleaching.

name: Snail
description: A snail, a slow-moving, snail-like mollusk in a spiraling shell. Generally depicted as a brown snail in full profile facing left or right, with a brown, textured shell and tentacle-like eyes.

name: Butterfly
description: A butterfly, a beautiful winged insect whose larva is a caterpillar. Depicted with its wings outspread, as a blue-and-black morpho butterfly or orange-and-black monarch butterfly.

name: Bug
description: A bug, or insect, generally depicted as a caterpillar, which becomes a 🦋 Butterfly. Shown in full profile facing left, inching up on the back of its green, segmented, and textured body. Often featuring black stripes or yellow dots and tentacles on its head.

name: Ant
description: An ant, a small, industrious insect that lives in a colony. Depicted as a black or red ant in full profile on its six legs facing left, with a prominent abdomen and antennae.

name: Honeybee
description: A honey bee, a busy, flying insect that lives in a hive and makes honey. Depicted as a black-and-yellow bee with clear or white wings and a stinger. Variously facing left in full profile or shown from above.

name: Beetle
description: A green or brown beetle shown with antennae and six legs. Can be used to talk about beetles, bugs, or insects in general.

name: Lady Beetle
description: A ladybug (ladybird, lady beetle), a beetle with a round, red shell with black spots. Generally depicted as a seven- or nine-spotted ladybug shown from above on its six legs, with antennae and its distinctively red-and-black, halved shell.

name: Cricket
description: A cricket, a hopping insect that makes a chirping sound. Depicted as a brown or green cricket in full profile on its six legs facing left, with long antennae and large, bent back legs.

name: Cockroach
description: A brown cockroach shown with antennae, six legs, and two sensory pads at its rear called cerci.

name: Spider
description: A spider, an eight-legged arachnid that spins a web. Depicted as a common black spider, as a house spider or funnel-web spider, often shown from above with its large abdomen oriented at the bottom.

name: Spider Web
description: A classic spider web (cobweb), as spun by a 🕷️ Spider to catch prey. Depicted as a white, symmetrical, wheel-shaped web, as an orb web, with six or eight equal sectors.

name: Scorpion
description: A scorpion, an arachnid with lobster-like pincers and a stinging tail. Depicted as a light-brown scorpion from above, often facing left, with its pincers and curving stinger raised. Shown with six or, accurately, eight legs in addition to its pincers.

name: Mosquito
description: A mosquito, a type of bloodsucking fly. Depicted as a brown or black mosquito on its six, long legs, with wings, long abdomen, and needle-like mouth. Variously shown from above or facing left.

name: Fly
description: A fly with a dark or iridescent green body, six legs, and two translucent wings. On most platforms, its eyes are red.

name: Worm
description: A pink or brown worm. Most platforms have more realistic designs, though Google and Samsung feature cartoony worms who are smiling sweetly.

name: Microbe
description: A microbe, as a bacterium grown in a 🧫 Petri Dish or observed under a 🔬 Microscope. Generally depicted as a squiggly, single-celled microorganism with prominent cilia. Color, shape, and position vary across platforms. Commonly used to represent bacteria, viruses, and germs and disease more generally.

name: Bouquet
description: A bouquet of brightly colored flowers. Generally depicted as a collection of pink and yellow flowers with green stems tied together. Positioned at various angles across platforms.

name: Cherry Blossom
description: The pink flower of a cherry blossom tree. Depicted as a single, light-pink cherry blossom with five, notched petals and red-tipped stamens in a yellow or white center.

name: White Flower
description: A stylized white flower. Generally depicted as a rosette-shaped cherry blossom in pink or red outline, often with a white fill.

name: Lotus
description: A pink lotus flower in full bloom.

name: Rosette
description: A rosette, a stylized, flower-shaped decoration often presented as an award with a ribbon or (military) medal. Appears as a motif in ancient cultures. Generally depicted as a circular, yellow-and-orange flower.

name: Rose
description: A red rose. Depicted as a single, vertical red rose on a green stem.

name: Wilted Flower
description: A flower that has wilted, or is dying. Generally depicted as a limp, faded red rose drooping over the to the right on a dried-out, green stem, shedding a petal.

name: Hibiscus
description: A pink hibiscus, a flower that grows in warm climates. Depicted as a single, deep-pink hibiscus flower with green leaves and prominent, yellow stamen.

name: Hyacinth
description: A hyacinth with purple blossoms and a green stem.

name: Sunflower
description: A sunflower, a tall, round flower with large yellow petals. Depicted as a single, vertical sunflower with a large, dark-brown center on a green stem.

name: Blossom
description: A flower that has blossomed. Depicted as a flower with white or yellow petals, as a daisy, with a golden center.

name: Tulip
description: A pink tulip flower. Depicted as a single, vertical pink tulip on a green stem.

name: Seedling
description: A seedling, or a young plant, as a newly sprouted tree. Depicted as a tiny, light-green plant with a short stem and two leaves. Often shown freshly sprung from a small mound of brown earth.

name: Potted Plant
description: A leafy green plant in pot. Plant type varies by platform.

name: Evergreen Tree
description: An evergreen tree, which keeps green leaves all year round. Depicted as a tall, dark green, cone-shaped tree with shaggy, layered leaves, as a pine or fir, showing a brown trunk.

name: Deciduous Tree
description: A deciduous tree, whose leaves change color before shedding, as 🍂 Fallen Leave, in the fall/autumn. Depicted as a generic tree with a round, lush, leafy top and brown trunk.

name: Palm Tree
description: A palm tree, a tree-like plant, as grows by the sea. Depicted as a palm tree with long, green, feather-like leaves and a tall, brown, segmented trunk.

name: Cactus
description: A cactus, a spiky plant that grows in very dry regions. Depicted as a light-green saguaro cactus with two side arms covered in spines.

name: Sheaf of Rice
description: A rice plant, as grown before harvesting and processing. Depicted as a sheaf of Asian rice with green leaves and yellow seed heads drooping over to the right or left. Sometimes assumed to be wheat.

name: Herb
description: An herb, a plant used in cooking or medicine. Depicted as a green sprig, as of basil, sage, or oregano, generally with five or seven leaves.

name: Shamrock
description: A shamrock, a clover-like plant. Depicted as a bright green sprig with three, heart-shaped leaves.

name: Four Leaf Clover
description: A four-leaf clover, a symbol of good luck. Depicted as a bright green sprig of clover, with four, heart-shaped leaves.

name: Maple Leaf
description: The distinctive, star-shaped leaf of the maple tree. Depicted as a reddish-orange maple leaf, as has changed color in the fall/autumn, with five pointed segments.

name: Fallen Leaf
description: Leaves, as a have changed color and fallen from a tree in fall/autumn. Depicted as two or three golden-brown, almond-shaped leaves of various sizes, with stems up, as if falling down.

name: Leaf Fluttering in Wind
description: Leaves, as fluttering in a spring or summer breeze. Depicted as one or two green, almond-shaped leaves, with gray or blue motion lines, as if swirling in the air or as the wind blowing through the trees.

name: Empty Nest
description: An empty bird's nest.

name: Nest with Eggs
description: A bird's nest with eggs inside.

name: Grapes
description: A grape bunch, as cut from the vine and used to make wine. Depicted as red (purple-colored) grapes.

name: Melon
description: A melon fruit in a light greenish-brown rind. Depicted as a cantaloupe by most platforms, but can resemble a honeydew at a distance.

name: Watermelon
description: A slice of watermelon, showing its rich pink flesh, black seeds, and green rind.

name: Tangerine
description: An orange-colored citrus fruit with a green leaf or leaves and stem. Officially depicting a tangerine, a type of mandarin (mikan in Japan). Often used as a garden-variety orange. Either way, a good source of vitamin C.

name: Lemon
description: The sour, yellow-colored citrus fruit of the lemon, usually with a stem and green leaf or leaves.

name: Banana
description: A ripe banana, peeled and ready to eat on major platforms. Great snack for a child or monkey.

name: Pineapple
description: The tropical fruit of a pineapple, shown in spiky, golden-brown skin and with a pointed, green crown. Positioned upright or at a 45° angle.

name: Mango
description: The ripe fruit of a tropical mango. Variously depicted in shades of yellow, red, orange, and green with a single, green leaf and stem.

name: Red Apple
description: A classic red apple, shown with a stem and single, green leaf on major platforms. Commonly associated with doctors, teachers, and New York.

name: Green Apple
description: A common green apple, tarter counterpart to the Red Apple. Displayed with a stem and single, green leaf on major platforms.

name: Pear
description: A light-green variety of a common pear, shown with a stem and sometimes green leaf.

name: Peach
description: The fleshy, pinkish-orange fruit of the fuzzy peach, shown with green leaves and sometimes a stem.

name: Cherries
description: Two rich red cherries with a green leaf and joined at their long stems. May be used to refer to breasts on TikTok and other social media platforms.

name: Strawberry
description: The fruit of a rich red strawberry dotted with seeds and crowned with green leaves. Google previously depicted the fruit in orange.

name: Blueberries
description: A few ripe blueberries clustered together. Most platforms show three blueberries, and some show small green leaves coming out from behind the blueberries.

name: Kiwi Fruit
description: A kiwifruit, or Chinese gooseberry, with its fuzzy, brown skin sliced open to show its light-green flesh, white core, and black seeds.

name: Tomato
description: A plump, red garden tomato topped with a leafy green stem. May resemble the red apple at small sizes.

name: Olive
description: One, two, or three green olives, either pitted or sprouting from a branch. Some platforms show a solitary pitted green olive stuffed with a piece of a pimento pepper.

name: Coconut
description: The hairy shell of a tropical coconut, cracked in a half to show its milky-white meat.

name: Avocado
description: A pear-shaped avocado, sliced in half to show its yellow-green flesh and large brown pit. Ready for toast, guacamole, or millennial jokes.

name: Eggplant
description: A long, bulbous, bright purple eggplant, or aubergine in British English, shown with a leafy stem. Considered lucky in Japan to dream of an eggplant the first night of the New Year.

name: Potato
description: A whole potato—such as a russet, used for baking, mashing, or frying—shown with a few eyes on its golden-brown skin. Not to be confused with the roasted sweet potato.

name: Carrot
description: A whole, bright orange carrot, topped with long green leaves, as if freshly plucked from the garden. Some platforms feature a longer, thinner carrot, others a shorter, more bulbous one.

name: Ear of Corn
description: An ear of corn, or maize, partially husked to show its buttery-yellow kernels.

name: Hot Pepper
description: A bright red Mexican chili pepper, slightly curled and with a green stem. May be used to represent something “hot and spicy,” figuratively or literally, as a dish on a restaurant menu.

name: Bell Pepper
description: A perfectly ripe red or green bell pepper. Can be used to talk about bell peppers or food in general.

name: Cucumber
description: A long, green cucumber with bumpy skin. Resembles its derived product, a pickle or gherkin, on many platforms, except on Apple and WhatsApp, which depict it with light-green, seed-y slices.

name: Leafy Green
description: A head of a rich green leaf vegetable, usually shown with white stalks. May be used to represent a variety of greens, including romaine lettuce, chard, and Chinese cabbage like bok choy, as commonly cooked in Asian cuisines.

name: Broccoli
description: A rich green, tree-like head or floret of broccoli.

name: Pea Pod
description: A green pea pod split to reveal a row of peas inside.

name: Garlic
description: A single white or light brown bulb of garlic. Can be used to talk about cooking, eating, or vampire protection.

name: Onion
description: A round yellow onion. Can be used to talk about cooking, eating, or crying. Sometimes used in metaphors about layers. Might also be used in computing contexts in reference to onion routing.

name: Ginger
description: A segment of ginger root with light brown skin and a yellowish core.

name: Mushroom
description: The edible fungus of the mushroom, depicted as a toadstool with a white-spotted red cap and stem.

name: Peanuts
description: The pod of the peanut, shown in its rounded, grooved, light-brown shell. Apple depicts a pair.

name: Beans
description: Beans, as used in cuisines around the world.

name: Chestnut
description: The reddish-brown, acorn-shaped chestnut, tapering to a sharp tip from its light brown base on most platforms. A popular roasted snack associated with autumn and Christmas.

name: Bread
description: A loaf of white or wheat bread, as before it is sliced for toast or sandwiches. May also be used to denote financial success, as per the slang term "let's get this bread".

name: Croissant
description: The flaky, golden-brown crescent of a croissant, a breakfast pastry associated with France and Austria.

name: Baguette Bread
description: The long, thin loaf of a baguette, with scoring on its golden-brown crust. A bread commonly associated with France. May also be used to denote financial success, as per the slang term "let's get this bread".

name: Flatbread
description: A round piece of flatbread with grill marks. Used to represent any type of flatbread, soft or crunchy.

name: Pretzel
description: The heart-shaped twist of a hard or soft golden-brown pretzel, seasoned with grains of salt. A snack commonly associated with Germany.

name: Bagel
description: The brown bread of a bagel, shown sliced in two halves. Some platforms depict seeds, as sesame or poppy, and a schmear of cream cheese, with the bagel assembled as a sandwich. May resemble the Doughnut at small sizes.

name: Pancakes
description: A stack of breakfast pancakes, topped with a pad of butter and maple syrup oozing down its golden-brown sides, onto a plate on some platforms.

name: Waffle
description: A round or square Belgian waffle, baked to a golden brown. Most platforms depict this emoji topped with a pad of butter, and some include gooey syrup running down the sides.

name: Cheese Wedge
description: A wedge of yellow-orange cheese with holes, like a Swiss, but used for the food in general. May be used for various cheese-related slang expressions (e.g., “cheesy,” “say cheese,” “big cheese”).

name: Meat on Bone
description: A hunk of unspecified meat on a white bone, as associated with cartoon cavepersons or food in anime and manga (Japanese ano niku, “that meat”).

name: Poultry Leg
description: A crispy brown leg (drumstick) of chicken, duck, turkey, or other poultry on the bone, as roasted at Thanksgiving or Christmas dinner or fried at fast-food restaurants.

name: Cut of Meat
description: A cut of uncooked red meat, as a T-bone or rib-eye steak, with the light, white marbling of fat.
